title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 487 - Collection And Refund Of Taxes
content:

State Regulations
§ 487.1 - Actions to collect taxes
§ 487.2 - Service of process
§ 487.3 - Seizure of motor vehicles
§ 487.4 - Refunds

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 487

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509, 697[a], 1096 [a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
